items.sentence: Tom thought about what he\'d do when he got out of prison.
Tom just wants Mary to help him with his English homework.
Tom knows better than to give his real name in chat rooms.
Tom likes oranges and eats around 3 or 4 of them per week.
Hundreds of trees in this park blew over in the hurricane.
I assume you asked Tom to tell Mary what the situation is.
I bought a scarf for my grandfather for his 88th birthday.
I brought a jacket because it was quite cool this morning.
I can often hear pigeons cooing outside my bedroom window.
It isn\'t at all rare to live to be over ninety years old.
